semantic_identifier: [GOLD-194]: Add auditable change history + source provenance for Attribution Evidence fields
title: Add auditable change history + source provenance for Attribution Evidence fields

sections.text: Implement an audit trail for all Attribution Evidence field updates on Issue objects, capturing previous/new values, timestamp, actor (user vs. enrichment job), and source references (CRM/opportunity/conversation IDs). Expose this history in the Issue detail view so stakeholders can verify when/why attribution inputs changed. Ensure enrichment writes include stable source pointers to reduce internal disputes about data origin.
